title: F12 window "roll-up" and "roll-down"
body: Sometimes I need to debug issues in IE on client machines that have limited screen resolution such that switching between F12 tools and IE tab(s) is painful.  I find this to be particularly true among clients using ultra books and tablets with less than 1080 vertical pixels.  I realize the F12 tools already dock/undock, minimize and are themselves resizable but that only goes so far on such small screens.  (Note: I’m referring specifically to cases where issues are not reproducible on development machines and thus the emulation options, as great as they are, wouldn’t help here.)

comments.body: I would suggest when horizontally docked, when clicking a button with an array-down it rolls down to only the title bar on the buttom of the browser. clicking that same button with array-up brings it back up. The same should work for a future vertical docking.
The F12 button? Seems like that does what you're asking for.
